name: Ninja Jump (itch) (mad2026)
description:
Title: Ninja Jump

Platform: Web game

Genre: Platformer

Rating: E

Target Market: Ages 5+

Game Overview:
Ninja Jump is an endless vertical platformer that gradually speeds up as you progress throughout the game. 
Do you have what it takes to be the ultimate ninja? Prove it by beating the Dev High Score of 2807!

Controls: Move left and right with 'A and D' or 'Left and Right' Jump with the space bar

Game Design Team: Mason Davenport – Sole Developer

Hint: you can begin moving left and right before your first jump!
